Package io.github.ai4ci.functions

Interface KernelFunction

All Known Subinterfaces:
DiscreteFunction, EmpiricalKernel, GaussianKernel
public interface KernelFunction
Interface for kernel functions that operate on discrete integer ranges.

Kernel functions are typically used for convolution operations and probability distributions with discrete support. Supports multiple implementations including empirical kernels, discrete functions, and Gaussian kernels.
